title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BYOK: The Key to Meeting Enterprise SaaS Security Demands (ISV405)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - BYOK:满足企业级SaaS安全需求的关键 (ISV405)
abstract: Software providers face increasing pressure from enterprise customers demanding greater control over their data protection and sovereignty. This session demonstrates how ISVs can leverage AWS KMS and client-side encryption to implement robust customer-managed key capabilities. We'll explore architectural patterns, implementation challenges, and best practices that help software providers meet enterprise security requirements while maintaining operational efficiency. Cloud architects and security professionals at software providers (ISVs) will learn how to enhance their platform's security posture and create a competitive advantage in the enterprise market.
abstract_cn: 软件提供商面临来自企业客户日益增长的压力，这些客户要求对其数据保护和主权拥有更大的控制权。本次会议演示了ISV如何利用AWS KMS和客户端加密来实现强大的客户管理密钥功能。我们将探讨架构模式、实施挑战以及最佳实践，帮助软件提供商满足企业安全要求，同时保持运营效率。软件提供商（ISV）的云架构师和安全专业人员将学习如何增强其平台的安全态势，并在企业市场中创造竞争优势。
